extendedInfo.description: Connecting The Dots Women's Bible Study helps us connect the dots between our faith in Jesus and the struggles we face in our every day lives. Our passion is to help women see the importance of knowing God's Word along with recognizing His complete control over all the circumstances we face in life.

reviews.title: Corletia
reviews.comment: I love the study on revelation but it breaks in and out so much so I\'d have to exit out and start all over. And i kept having to push play to keep it going. But i love the teaching and the inside into the history of each church and how she taught us to interpreted scriptures with scriptures.
reviews.author: Corletia Conley

reviews.title: Lisa is a great teacher
reviews.comment: I first found this bible study on my Roku.  I\'m looking forward to being able to listen and learn from Lisa on the go.
reviews.author: Susan Gibbons
